document.full_text: "to this day,'' uyanga tamir, a high school senior from denver writes, "i reopen my letters just to confirm that they are correctly addressed to me, uyanga tamir.''
document.title: an agonizing wait prolonged by a cellphone internet hookup
lines_and_colors: "to this day,'' uyanga tamir, a high school senior from denver writes, "i reopen my letters just to confirm that they are correctly addressed to me, uyanga tamir.''
